languages.text: {n}Забытье выпускает вас из своих когтей, и вы выплываете из мрака жаркого забвения. Все тело болит и саднит: многочисленные порезы и синяки пятнают кожу, запястья и бедра ноют от глухой боли. Где-то на задворках сознания крутится мутное, едва различимое воспоминание о боли... и взращенного в ее омуте наслаждения.{/n}

{n}Oblivion releases you from its clawed grip and you slowly swim up out of the gloom of your fevered slumber. Your entire body aches and smarts: your skin is peppered with countless cuts and bruises, and a dull gnawing pain radiates through your wrists and hips. A hazy, almost indiscernible memory hovers somewhere at the edge of your consciousness — a memory of pain... and of the pleasure reaped in its depths.{/n}

languages.text: {n}湮灭将你从它的魔爪中释放出来。你慢慢从阴沉的黑暗中站起身来，感到全身疼痛难忍。你的皮肤上布满了数不清的划伤与瘀伤，手腕与臀部传来了阵阵钻心的疼痛。某种朦胧的、几乎难以辨认的记忆，徘徊在你意识的边缘——那段记忆充满了痛苦……以及在痛苦深处收获的快感。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたを掴んでいた忘却が爪を放し、熱っぽい眠りの闇からゆっくりぷかぷかと浮かび上がっていく。身体中が痛んでヒリヒリとしていた。肌には無数の切り傷や打撲痕がポツポツとあり、じんわりした鈍い痛みが手首と腰に広がっていく。ぼんやりしていてほとんど思い出せない記憶が、意識の端のどこかに漂っている…痛みの記憶と…その奥で感じた悦びの記憶だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Oblivion releases you from its clawed grip and you slowly swim up out of the gloom of your fevered slumber. Your entire body aches and smarts: your skin is peppered with countless cuts and bruises, and a dull gnawing pain radiates through your wrists and hips. A hazy, almost indiscernible memory hovers somewhere at the edge of your consciousness — a memory of pain... and of the pleasure reaped in its depths.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El olvido afloja la presa que tiene sobre ti y poco a poco despiertas de la penumbra de tu sueño febril. Te duele todo el cuerpo y tienes la piel llena de hematomas y cortes. Un dolor sordo recorre tus muñecas y caderas. Un recuerdo borroso, casi incomprensible, flota al borde de tu consciencia. Es un recuerdo del dolor... y del placer encontrado en sus profundidades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Oblivion releases you from its clawed grip and you slowly swim up out of the gloom of your fevered slumber. Your entire body aches and smarts: your skin is peppered with countless cuts and bruises, and a dull gnawing pain radiates through your wrists and hips. A hazy, almost indiscernible memory hovers somewhere at the edge of your consciousness — a memory of pain... and of the pleasure reaped in its depths.{/n}

Es un recuerdo del dolor... y del placer encontrado en sus profundidades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'oubli relâche son étreinte glacée et vous émergez lentement des profondeurs ténébreuses d'un sommeil fébrile. Votre corps tout entier est brûlant et endolori ; votre peau est couturée d'innombrables coupures et contusions, et une douleur sourde irradie de vos poignets et de vos hanches. Une réminiscence brumeuse, à peine discernable, perdure quelque part en périphérie de votre conscience. Le souvenir de la souffrance... et de la volupté cachée dans ses abysses insondables.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Oblivion releases you from its clawed grip and you slowly swim up out of the gloom of your fevered slumber. Your entire body aches and smarts: your skin is peppered with countless cuts and bruises, and a dull gnawing pain radiates through your wrists and hips. A hazy, almost indiscernible memory hovers somewhere at the edge of your consciousness — a memory of pain... and of the pleasure reaped in its depths.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Langsam entziehst du dich dem Sog des Versinkens und befreist dich langsam aus der Finsternis deines Fiebertraums. Dein ganzer Körper schmerzt und leidet: Deine Haut ist von zahllosen Wunden und Blutergüssen übersät, und ein dumpfer, nagender Schmerz strahlt in deine Handgelenke und Hüften aus. Am Horizont deiner Gedanken schwebt eine verschleierte, kaum wahrnehmbare Erinnerung – sie löst ein Gefühl von Schmerz bei dir aus ... und das Gefühl von Vergnügen, das du in den Tiefen dieses Schmerzes erfahren hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Oblivion releases you from its clawed grip and you slowly swim up out of the gloom of your fevered slumber. A hazy, almost indiscernible memory hovers somewhere at the edge of your consciousness — a memory of pain... and of the pleasure reaped in its depths.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unutkanlığın pençeli elleri seni serbest bırakıyor. Alev alev yandığın uykunun kasvetinden yavaşça yüzerek kurtuluyorsun. Tüm bedenin ağrıyıp sızlıyor. Derini sayısız kesik ve çürük süslüyor. Bileklerinden ve kalçalarından duygularını körelten yoğun bir acı yayılıyor. Puslu, neredeyse fark edilemeyecek bir hatıra; zihninin sınırlarında geziniyor. Acının ve... Derinlerden gelen o zevkin hatırası...{/n}
